tool_input.plan:
# Design Improvement Implementation Plan

## Overview
Implement design improvements inspired by Futures Fins while maintaining the monochromatic theme, enhancing typography, fixing spacing issues, reordering components, and improving mobile navigation.

## Detailed Implementation Steps

### 1. Typography System Enhancement
**Files to modify:** `tailwind.config.ts`, `app/globals.css`
- Update font sizes and line heights in Tailwind config
- Add refined font weight system (300-700 range)
- Create typography utility classes
- Implement letter-spacing adjustments for headings

### 2. Hero Section Spacing Improvements
**File to modify:** `components/Hero.tsx`
- Increase logo to title spacing from mb-8 to mb-12 (48px)
- Adjust title and subtitle spacing
- Move stats overlay from bottom-20 to bottom-12
- Increase internal padding in stats container
- Reduce font weights (bold → semibold, normal → light)

### 3. Component Reordering
**File to modify:** `app/page.tsx`
- Move PricingSection before StaticGallery
- New order: Hero → Pricing → Scoot → Gallery → Booking → FindUs

### 4. Mobile Navigation Padding
**File to modify:** `components/Header.tsx`
- Update mobile menu padding from py-6 px-4 to py-8 px-6
- Increase menu item spacing from py-2 to py-4
- Add mt-6 to button instead of pt-4

### 5. Gallery Typography & Spacing
**File to modify:** `components/StaticGallery.tsx`
- Reduce heading font weight
- Increase section padding
- Improve caption typography

### 6. Global Typography Improvements
**Files to modify:** All component files
- Update all h1 tags: font-bold → font-light or font-normal
- Update all h2 tags: font-bold → font-normal or font-medium
- Adjust line heights for better readability
- Increase section spacing throughout

### 7. Color Palette Refinement
**File to modify:** `tailwind.config.ts`
- Enhance gray scale with more nuanced values
- Ensure consistent usage across components

## Implementation Order
1. Update Tailwind configuration and globals.css
2. Fix Hero component spacing and typography
3. Reorder page components
4. Fix mobile navigation padding
5. Update typography across all components
6. Fine-tune spacing and visual details

## Expected Results
- More sophisticated, premium aesthetic similar to Futures Fins
- Better visual hierarchy with refined typography
- Improved readability and user experience
- Properly spaced hero section with breathing room
- Touch-friendly mobile navigation
- Logical content flow with gallery positioned appropriately
- Maintained monochromatic theme throughout

    <main className="min-h-screen">
      <Header />
      <Hero />
      <StaticGallery />
      <PricingSection />

}
